title: Thunderbird va in crash se clicco Rispondi o Inoltra con specifici messaggi
content: Versione 102.9.0 Windows 10 Pro quando clicco su rispondi o inoltra certi messaggi Thunderbird va sempre in crash, con tutti gli altri messaggi invece il comando funziona normalmente. Gli ultimi due con cui mi succede hanno thread lunghi con molte immagini ed allegati Ho provato in Safe Mode, stesso problema con lo stesso messaggio Sono pentitissimo di aver aggiornato da una versione in doppia cifra (tipo 60 o 70) ad una a tripla 102
creator: axo278

title: thunderbird 102.11.0 32 bit launch icon shows wrong number of messages unread
content: thunderbird 102.11.0 launch icon shows wrong number of messages unread. this release shows wrong number of unread messages in the launch icon, worked before the last update . . I think?? I am using a 64 bit win 11 laptop . . The window that pops up when i click on the icon with the red dot says I have 8 unread messages, when I only have 3 . . .the red dot goes away sometimes, but then when i re open thunderbird I hear a ding, and the red dot shows up again . . .
creator: lcapelis

title: on Startup the home screen is blank
content: On startup my home tab is completely empty. I can click on get messages and I see that this happens in the background but the home tab with all folders and emails is disappeared. I can also send messages but just cant see anything. My version is the latest now updated this morning but did not make any difference. 102.11.1 (64bit). Any idea what it could be ?
creator: tino.sperling

title: Thunderbird can't login to Outlook server
content: I use Thunderbird as my mail app on my Macbook Pro. I have 2 active email accounts. One with Google, which works fine. The other is with Outlook and has worked fine until today. When trying to send or receive messages I get "Login to server outlook.office365.com with username failed". I know the username and password are correct because I can access Outlook through my browser (Mozilla) with username and password. Can you please offer some guidance? Thanks.
creator: taylor.bucci

title: POP not pulling old emails from server
content: I have set up Thunderbird to connect to my ISPs email server. I have 22,470 emails that will not download, from April 2022 - April 2019. Is there something in T-Bird I can set to force these to download? Or is there something wrong on the ISP end?
creator: mkburdette

title: Messages not imported correctly
content: Sometimes, often after an upgrade, messages IMAPed to Thunderbird do not display correctly. In two recent cases I moved two messages from the Spam folder to the Inbox. One of the messages was completely blank except for the subject. The other displayed HTML code instead of the readable messages. Both messages displayed correctly at my email provider's website. Is there a way or can you provide a way to tell Thunderbird to re-import a message?
creator: rmrubinsl

title: Unable to login at server. Probably...
content:
I have two gmail accounts, both working perfectly for years. Lets call them A1 and A2. last week A1 all of a sudden stopped working. Google asked me password and second pass verification. But when trying to connect to google again a message "authentication error" arrived.

I then disinstalled TB and downloaded it anew. A2 started working immediately, but when trying to redefine A1 the above message "Unable to login..." appeared. I then tried to define A1 on the TB of the laptop of my girlfriend. There it started working without any problems. Both PC's have the same TB version and are working under Windows 10 with the same version. Seems to me very strange.

Any ideas?
creator: aherz10@gmail.com

title: Dates for help articles
content: It would be great if you would include posting date and/or date reviewed to all help articles. It helps very much in knowing whether a help article pre-dates the version a user has installed, and in deciding which of similar articles is the most recent, etc. Thanks for considering this!
creator: libcub1

title: email will NOT send in Thunderbird
content: The email is sending in Gmail. I am receiving emails in this account, and now drafts are being saved but not sending. I have checked every setting and password. I am at my wits end. Copying a formatted message from T-bird to gmail is a big extra step. This is now a weeks worth of hassle. I've read every help article and most are fore MUCH earlier versions. I am fully updated on T-bird, Mozilla and using Windows 10. Two other gmail accounts are working fine on T-bird.
creator: lorilohman
